subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams scored 29 points and dished out 12 assists in the Nets’ victory, and P. J. Carlesimo tied for the best start by a coach in the franchise’s history.
snippet: Deron Williams scored 29 points and dished out 12 assists in the Nets’ victory, and P. J. Carlesimo tied for the best start by a coach in the franchise’s history.
